DataElement.preferredName: Investigational New Drug Or Prior Clinical Study Participation Eligibility Determination Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response as to whether a patient meets the criteria for enrolling onto a clinical study for questions related to new drugs or biological drugs used in a clinical investigations or the act of taking part in research which includes the development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapies, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Investigational New Drug Or Prior Clinical Study Participation Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A new drug or biological drug that is used in a clinical investigation. The term also includes a biological product that is used in vitro for diagnostic purposes._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Earlier in time or order._Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._The act of taking part in an activity._The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

Concepts.definition: A new drug or biological drug that is used in a clinical investigation. The term also includes a biological product that is used in vitro for diagnostic purposes.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

Property.preferredDefinition: Taking part in an activity.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: The act of taking part in an activity.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient received any othe
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational agents or has participated in an investigational drug trial within the past 4 weeks?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational agents within 21 days before the first dose of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex- 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received treatment with investigational prostate cancer directed therapy or enzalutamide within 4 weeks of treatment initiation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient currently or previously receiving an investigational agent or device within 4 weeks of the first dose of treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have cancer directed therapy within 3 weeks prior to registration?
